title: Normal mode Draft Pick
body: I used to play on EUW server and they had Normal Draft pick mode and i was wondering if you were able to put that into OCE or make a voting pole to have it in OCE would love draft mode so i don't have to play against certain champions (teemo) thanks, Maoritribe

replies.body:
You're just one year off. Normal Draft Pick mode was removed when Teambuilder was introduced. Riot says that not enough people played Normal Draft Pick mode to warrant its continued existence. Queue times were roughly twenty minutes, so it wasn't really missed.

Still though...

A work-around is to play rank, but of course, that's ranked, not normals.

Hope this helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Maoritribe,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=d1OXtOvR,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-18T02:07:56.505+0000)
>
> I used to play on EUW server and they had Normal Draft pick mode and i was wondering if you were able to put that into OCE or make a voting pole to have it in OCE would love draft mode so i don't have to play against certain champions (teemo) thanks, Maoritribe

Yes, Please bring Draft Pick
